exercises_key1:
Skills: Writing
Group Size: Individual
Time Limit: 1 hour
exercises_key3: You are incharge of finding a warden for NavGurukul. Write a paragraph about the qualifications that this person who gets the job must have as well as the qualifications s/he should have.
exercises_key4: You are are incharge of finding a Android Developer for your company. Write a paragraph about the qualifications that this person who gets the job must have as well as the qualifications s/he should have.
exercises_key8: Split the class into groups of 4. Give them the names of places e.g. petrol station, football stadium, hospital, jail, school etc. They must write the rules for 1 place and then read out the rules to the rest of the class. The other groups must try to guess the location from listening to the rules.
